titleStmt.title: A defence of the confuter of Bellarmin's Second note of the church, antiquity, against the cavils of the adviser
titleStmt.author: Tullie, George, 1652?-1695.

notesStmt.note: A defense of Simon Patrick's "The second note of the church examined."
Attributed to George Tullie. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
